name: Cube Run (PlayToTroll)
description:
Hey, I made this game in 5 Days for a school project in the 9th grade. During those 5 Days I made the code and the textures (except background) myself. 

In this game you have to play through 8 different levels. Four of them are top-down levels, and the other four are platformer levels.

Top-Down Movement: WASD or Arrow keys.  Goal: Get to the finish line.

Platformer Movement: A and D / Left and Right Arrow for horizontal movement. Spacebar to jump. W / Up arrow key to open the keydoors and walk through them.

In the Platformer levels, you will have to find minimum one key for as key door, to get to the finish line / finish flag.

There is no pause or main menu. You can skip a level by holding "Tab" for 3 Seconds (Until the level fades)

I hope you enjoy this small project.
